snippet: The study by the Association of National Advertisers and White Ops said automated clicks will cost the advertising industry $6.3 billion in 2015.
abstract: Report published by Assn of National Advertisers and White Ops forecasts that fraudulent operators using robots to impersonate humans clicking on digital ads will rob advertising industry of $6.3 billion in 2015.
lead_paragraph: The study by the Association of National Advertisers and White Ops said automated clicks will cost the advertising industry $6.3 billion in 2015.

headline.main: Study Puts a Price Tag on Fake Ad Clicks
headline.print_headline: Study Puts a Price Tag on Fake Ad Clicks
